Megan Hall bụ onye odee South Africa

A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 ma biri na Cape Town, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta BA Honors na Mahadum Cape Town, na-eso akara mmụta mahadum na bekee na Latin. Mpempe abụ mbụ ya, Nwa nke Anọ, (Akwụkwọ Modjaji, 2007) nwetara ihe nrite Ingrid Jonker maka 2008. Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ bụ onye njikwa mbipụta maka akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu na akwụkwọ na Oxford University Press, mana hapụrụ na 2018 ma na-enwere onwe ya ugbu a.
